page.title: 04A Day at School.
page.content: Today is Tuesday May 21st 1985. My name is Karen Anne Shanahan. I am eleven. I got up at 8:oo a.m. got dressed and went downstairs.Mum was making the sandwiches. She told me to feed the hens (6 Black Rock, 6 Warren and a cockerel).When I came back in I got the rabbit feed and fed him. After I had fed the rabbit it was 8:15 I had my breakfast (egg on toast) then cleaned my teeth. I then brushed my hair, packed my school bag and got into the car. It was about 8.45 a.m. when I got to school.I go to Stokesay C.P. School.In our school we have 6 teachers and 138 children in 5 classes.The teachers are,Mr. Bennion,the Headmaster,Mr. Owen,Deputy Head,Mrs.Crowther,Mrs. Redfern,Mrs.Fildes,Mrs.Davies and Mrs.Badman.
